about_the_game:
Squares Rage is a minimalist style puzzle / "rage" game, in which the player is a square who must navigate through a series of puzzles that get increasingly more difficult. Use the arrow keys to navigate the square to the flag at the end of the level in as few deaths as possible! Press 'S' to self-destruct (if you need to)!

This is the demo! If you are looking for a more in-depth description, please refer to the main game's store page.

The demo features the first few levels of the game, to help you get a feel for it before you purchase it!

Enjoy!

name: Squares Rage Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10
  • Graphics: Nothing fancy. Be able to at least handle pixel-art/8-bit style graphics.
  • Sound Card: Pretty much any.

short_description: Have you ever played a game that is so fun, but is also so infuriating that you wanted to throw your keyboard against the wall? Squares Rage is one of those. You have been warned. (This is the Demo!)
